com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.types.prefs

Interface OCSPPreferences

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommonPreferences
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OCSPPreferencesImpl

    public interface OCSPPreferences
extends CommonPreferences
    This class stores preferences for OCSP support.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getAllowOCSPNoCheck()
      Allow OCSP NoCheck Extension
      HashAlgorithm getDigestAlgorithm()
      Digest Algorithm to be used for OCSPRequests CertID
      boolean getDoSignRequest()
      Gets whether OCSP request would be signed or not.
      boolean getGoOnline()
      Indicates if online OCSP server can be contacted for revocation information
      boolean getIgnoreValidityDates()
      Indicates if OCSP validity needs to be honored
      long getMaxClockSkew()
      Gets the maximum Skew time allowed between the OCSP Server's clock and the local computer.
      String getOcspServerURL()
      Gets the Server URL configured to lookup for OCSP Responses.
      PKICredential getRequestSignerCredential()
      Gets the Alias of the credential to be used for signing the OCSP Request
      boolean getRequireOCSPCertHash()
      Indicates if OCSP Response CertID needs to be have certificate hash
      long getResponseFreshness()
      Gets the allowed OCSP Response freshness.
      boolean getSendNonce()
      Gets Whether a nonce should be a part of the OCSP request.
      OCSPURLtoConsultOption getURLtoConsult()
      Gets The type of OCSP Server URL to use for fetching revocation information
      boolean getUseCache()
      Indicates if OCSP Response needs to be cached/used till OCSP nextUpdate

      • Methods inherited from interface com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.types.prefs.CommonPreferences

        getRevocationCheck

        long getResponseFreshness()
        Gets the allowed OCSP Response freshness. If the response was created within this time, the response is accepted.
        Returns:
